mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart(u_code, s_code, m_name, amount, m_photo, m_price) values(#{u_code}, #{s_code}, #{m_name}, #{amount}, #{m_photo}, #{m_price})
mapper.select: select s_code from tbl_cart where u_code = #{u_code} group by s_code
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cart where u_code = #{u_code} and m_name = #{m_name}
